name: Stuck In a Hoard (While Looping)
description:
This is a game about a ball that is escaping other "Bad" balls, It never ends!

This is my Second Game Jam Game! 

(Recomended using latest version

Currently Working on: 

-Better Music.

-An ending chime 

-Moving the camera (Maybe?)

(0.2 Release)

-Obstacles

-Fixed a bug that when you fall to the void, it dosen't give you the game over screen
